name: Shrimp Fried Rice II
author: OKBAT
summary: The real shrimp fried rice, restaurant style. This is how I used to cook fried rice when my father still owned a restaurant.
ingredients: 1 ½ cups cooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined without tail
directions: In a saucepan bring water to a boil
Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes
Set aside and allow rice to cool
Heat a large skillet or wok for 2 minutes
When the skillet or wok is hot, pour in vegetable oil, bean sprouts and onions
Mix well and cook for 3 minutes
Mix in cooled rice and shrimp and cook for another 3 minutes
Mix in green onions, eggs, salt, pepper, soy sauce and sesame oil
Cook for another 4 minutes, stirring continuously, until eggs are cooked and everything is blended evenly
